Author: Phil

Author: Phil

Author: Eric TF Bat
Comment: As an emergency backup to GMail, I recommend FastMail (<http://fastmail.fm/>), a more-than-adequate mail system based in Melbourne, Australia. They have a little more downtime than Google, often due to the lads fiddling around on the production server when they shouldn’t, but they’re a lot more accountable and can be reached by phone if all else fails. They also did IMAP a long time before Google did.
